section.para: The configuration of JBoss Tattletale is done through its

The current configuration parameters includes:

entry.para: Specifies which classloader structure that should be used when scanning the archives. Can be one of the following:

listitem.para: A no-operation classloader structure implementation that doesn't scope any archives.
A classloader structure implementation that scopes based on JBoss Application Server 4.x directory structures.
A classloader structure implementation that scopes based on JBoss Application Server 5.x directory structures.

A comma separated list of black listed classes or packages. F.ex. com.mycompany.forinternaluseonly, com.partner.forinternaluseonly

section.para: NOTE: The classloader structure feature is currently based on directory structures and may therefore fail to identify archives that should be included in the reports. If you want to be sure that all archives are included use the NoopClassLoaderStructure plugin.
